duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead projects from discovery to delivery, driving initiatives impacting a larger team of 10+ engineers in partnership with other EMs, PMs, and TPMs.
Collaborate with tech leads and multi-functional peers to develop a roadmap and resolve external dependencies.
Work cross-functionally with teams across the organization to ship projects and products that will make users more productive.
Craft a meaningful vision for the team, aligning with product managers, designers, user research, and customers.
Ensure commitments to ship high-quality software on time, communicating key milestones and risks to commitments across the product development team and company.
Be accountable for driving project execution and fostering a diverse, collaborative, and inclusive environment within the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
